title: Online Payments Available, Pet Friendly, Pet-friendly
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '1200', 'Address:', '1437 Central Ave', 'The Avalon is located in the heart of Midtown at the corner of Poplar Avenue and Avalon Street.', 'Our large two-bedroom/two-bathroom apartment homes boast lots of natural light, crown-molding, high ceilings, and original hardwood floors.', 'The spacious living room and separate dining room are perfect for having guests over.', 'Renovated units include quartz countertops.', 'Stainless steel appliances, and updated light fixtures and select units include washers and driers.', "We can't wait to welcome you home!", 'Amenities Include:', 'Cable Ready', 'Granite Countertops and Subway Tile', 'Swimming Pool', 'Pet Friendly', 'Central Heat and Air', 'Online Service Requests', 'Large Closet', 'Controlled Access', 'Spacious Floorplans', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Air Conditioning', 'Pet-friendly', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
